overview: In this rare, surviving one-reel Western from the pioneering Kalem company, Ruth Roland's fianc√©, Dick, is falsely accused of robbing a bank, a dirty deed actually committed by one Black McCarty. Roland helps Dick escape and later supplies him with a weapon, but her irate father, the sheriff, must be put out of action -- by his own handcuffs as it turns out -- before the villain can be captured and peace restored.
title: The Sheriff of Stone Gulch
